text: Honestly, 'After Hours' is a masterpiece. The production quality is insane and the transitions are seamless. 10/10.
Listening to 'Rumours' again. It never gets old. The drama behind this album just makes the music hit harder.
Dynamite Bounce is literally stuck in my head all day! That chorus is addictive.
Etta James singing 'At Last' gives me chills every single time. Pure emotion.
Anyone going to the Neon Nights festival next month? I need a ride from LA!
Just bought a new Fender Stratocaster! Can't wait to learn some Hendrix riffs.
Does anyone know what plugin was used for the synth bass in the new Tame Impala track?
Found a mint condition copy of 'Dark Side of the Moon' at a garage sale for $5. Best day ever.
That warehouse rave last night was incredible. My ears are still ringing.
It's a rainy day, perfect for some tea and sad indie folk music.
Just discovered this Kendrick track. Absolutely fire! ðŸ”¥
OK Computer is a timeless masterpiece. If you haven't heard it yet, what are you waiting for?
